title: Frequently Asked Questions
heading: Frequently Asked Questions
subheading: Find answers to common questions about Men's Health Finder

questions.question: What is Men's Health Finder?
questions.answer: Men's Health Finder is a comprehensive directory of men's health clinics across the United States. We help men find specialized healthcare providers for testosterone replacement therapy, erectile dysfunction treatment, weight management, and other men's health services.

questions.question: Is Men's Health Finder free to use?
questions.answer: Yes, Men's Health Finder is completely free for patients to search and find clinics. We're supported by our clinic partners who pay for enhanced listings.

questions.question: How do I find a clinic near me?
questions.answer: Simply enter your city or ZIP code in the search bar on our homepage. You can also filter results by specific services you're looking for.

questions.question: How are clinics verified?
questions.answer: All clinics on our platform go through a verification process where we confirm their licensing, credentials, and services offered. We also monitor patient reviews and feedback.

questions.question: Can I book appointments through Men's Health Finder?
questions.answer: Currently, we provide contact information for each clinic. You can call or visit their website directly to book appointments. We're working on integrated booking features.

questions.question: How do I leave a review for a clinic?
questions.answer: After visiting a clinic, you can leave a review by visiting their profile page and clicking the 'Write a Review' button. You'll need to create a free account to submit reviews.

questions.question: What types of services can I find?
questions.answer: We list clinics offering testosterone replacement therapy (TRT), erectile dysfunction treatment, weight management programs, hair loss treatment, peptide therapy, IV therapy, and more men's health services.

questions.question: Are online/telehealth providers included?
questions.answer: Yes, we have a dedicated section for online providers that offer telehealth consultations and ship medications directly to patients.

questions.question: How do I know which service is right for me?
questions.answer: We recommend consulting with a healthcare provider. Our clinic profiles include detailed information about services offered, and many clinics offer free consultations.
